Open airway.sentence: The healthcare provider positions the patient to optimize airway access.
Open airway.subject: The healthcare provider

Open airway.sentence: The healthcare provider tilts the patient's head back to open the airway.
Open airway.subject: The healthcare provider

Open airway.sentence: The healthcare provider lifts the chin to further maintain airway patency.
Open airway.subject: The healthcare provider

Open airway.sentence: The healthcare provider checks for any obstructions in the airway.
Open airway.subject: The healthcare provider

Open airway.sentence: The healthcare provider ensures that the airway remains clear and unobstructed.
Open airway.subject: The healthcare provider
